memberdef.name: MAP_X_TO_Y
memberdef.initializer: UINT32_C(0x01) /* Condition check for mapping X to Y */

memberdef.name: MAP_X_TO_Z
memberdef.initializer: UINT32_C(0x01) /* Condition check for mapping X to Z */

memberdef.name: MAP_Y_TO_X
memberdef.initializer: UINT32_C(0x01) /* Condition check for mapping Y to X */

memberdef.name: MAP_Y_TO_Z
memberdef.initializer: UINT32_C(0x02) /* Condition check for mapping Y to Z */

memberdef.name: MAP_Z_TO_X
memberdef.initializer: UINT32_C(0x02) /* Condition check for mapping Z to X */

memberdef.name: MAP_Z_TO_Y
memberdef.initializer: UINT32_C(0x02) /* Condition check for mapping Z to Y */

memberdef.name: MASK_TWO_LEAST_SIGNIFICANT_BITS
memberdef.initializer: UINT32_C(0x03) /* Masking condition for all axis config variable */

memberdef.name: X_AXIS_SIGN_MASK_VAL
memberdef.initializer: UINT32_C(0x01) /* Masking value for sign of X axis */

memberdef.name: Y_AXIS_CONFIG_SHIFT_VAL
memberdef.initializer: UINT32_C(0x02) /* shift config variable for Y axis */

memberdef.initializer: UINT32_C(0x02) /* Masking value for sign of Y axis */

memberdef.name: Z_AXIS_CONFIG_SHIFT_VAL
memberdef.initializer: UINT32_C(0x04) /* shift config variable for Z axis */

memberdef.name: Z_AXIS_SIGN_MASK_VAL
memberdef.initializer: UINT32_C(0x04) /* Masking value for sign of Z axis */
